entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
